title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2100 - Scope
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2100

Statutory authority: Emergency Housing Rent Control Law, L. 1946, ch. 274[4] [a],as amd.; L. 1950, ch. 250, as amd.; L. 1983, ch. 403, § 28; N.Y.C. Admin.Code, § 26-405g[1]; Public Housing Law, §
14[4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
